name: Adobe Dreamweaver Validator Configuration File
summary: Learn about .VTV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Dreamweaver includes several preinstalled VTV files for validating source code. For example, it includes an HTML validator file named html_all.vtv and a .JSP validator named jsp.vtv.

description: Code validation file used by Adobe Dreamweaver, an application used to build Web applications; contains XML data that specifies valid uses of source code tags; used for reporting programming errors during development.
